body: The constellation, [ White Clothed Phantom ] pleased by chilling story of this content
I don't know whether to be happy or sad.
Damn good one. Sad that he passed. Hopefully they'll meet again.
This is why I love this site man u got stories meant to make u fap  stories that make ya sad or mad or just like this one they make you fucking feel
Holy shit the writing was super well-versed. 10/10 for the story
holy fucc, that was wholesome as fuck!

I forget why I originally read this. After years of Touhou knock-off doujins that were utter shit as both hentai and as stories, I always just skip anything tagged Touhou, especially since I've never played any of the games or studied any of the lore. Somehow though, I read this one, and now I both love and curse it. Love it because its great erotica AND a great story, and curse it because now I second guess myself whenever I overturn anything with a touhou tag. and then it sucks. and I hate being burned more than once by the same fire.
On one hand, this is good. On the other hand, kill it with fire.
